  • Constructor Details

    • Sedan

      public Sedan​(java.lang.String maker, java.lang.String model, int seats) throws VehicleException, SedanException
      Constructor that checks the maker, model, seats validity and assigns them accordingly
      Parameters:
      maker - string showing maker of the sedan
      model - string showing model of the sedan
      seats - integer showing the seats fo sedan, either 4 or 5
      Throws:
      VehicleException - when maker and model are invalid
      SedanException - when seats is invalid

  • Method Details

    • setSeats

      public boolean setSeats​(int seats)
      setter for seats, which returns true if valid
      Parameters:
      seats - integer seat, only accept 4 or 5
      Returns:
      true if within range, false otherwise
